solution_line_template: After five days, Chantel has {first_period_days} * {bracelets_per_day_first_period} = <<{first_period_days}*{bracelets_per_day_first_period}={bracelets_after_first_period}>>{bracelets_after_first_period} bracelets.

After the next four days, she makes {second_period_days} * {bracelets_per_day_second_period} = <<{second_period_days}*{bracelets_per_day_second_period}={bracelets_made_second_period}>>{bracelets_made_second_period} bracelets.

In the end, Chantel has {bracelets_after_first_giveaway} + {bracelets_made_second_period} - {given_away_second_time} = <<{bracelets_after_first_giveaway}+{bracelets_made_second_period}-{given_away_second_time}={final_bracelets}>>{final_bracelets} bracelets.
